events.name: Arizona State Sun Devils at Fresno State Bulldogs

headlines.description: Ronnie Rivers rushed for 212 yards and two touchdowns, Anthoula "Tank" Kelly had a 70-yard interception return for a touchdown and No. 19 Fresno State beat Arizona State 31-20 in the Las Vegas Bowl on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Rivers, Fresno State top Arizona State in Las Vegas Bowl

video.headline: Fresno State takes lead on Rivers' 68-yard TD

events.name: Tulane Green Wave at Louisiana Ragin' Cajuns

headlines.description: Darius Bradwell rushed for a career-best 150 yards and two touchdowns to lead Tulane to its first postseason victory in 16 years, a 41-24 win over intrastate rival Louisiana-Lafayette in the Cure Bowl on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Bradwell's 2 TDs leads Tulane over Louisiana-Lafayette 41-24

events.name: Utah State Aggies at North Texas Mean Green

notes.headline: NEW MEXICO BOWL PRESENTED BY PROGRESSIVE

headlines.description: Jordan Love threw for 359 yards and four touchdowns and Jalen Greene had six catches for 151 yards and a score to help Utah State rout North Texas 52-13 in the New Mexico Bowl on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Utah State routs North Texas 52-13 in New Mexico Bowl

video.headline: Love completes 72-yard TD pass for Utah State

events.name: Georgia Southern Eagles at Eastern Michigan Eagles

headlines.description: Tyler Bass kicked a 40-yard field goal as time expired to give Georgia Southern a 23-21 victory over Eastern Michigan in the Camellia Bowl on Saturday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Georgia Southern tops Eastern Michigan 23-21 on Bass' FG

video.headline: Georgia Southern wins Camellia Bowl with 40-yard field goal

events.name: Middle Tennessee Blue Raiders at Appalachian State Mountaineers

headlines.description: Appalachian State receiver Malik Williams passed for two touchdowns on trick plays, quarterback Zac Thomas caught a scoring pass and threw for three more, and the Mountaineers routed Middle Tennessee 45-13 in the New Orleans Bowl on Saturday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Appalachian St. rolls past Middle Tenn. in N.O. Bowl, 45-13

video.headline: Appalachian QB catches TD off double reverse
